title: Paradise
lyrics:
We all in the back of my pickup, blue [?] down
With a hose running water inside
She was sipping on apple pie moonshine, that's when I saw
That tan leg beauty walk by
That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise

That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise, yeah, yeah



I woke up late, the sun rose before I laid down

Party was great but now it's onto the next round

Now strutting 'cause the coffee is stronger

Brushed my teeth, got dressed, time to get gone

My ride's kinda shiny and it's full of gas

My favorite song came on and I made it blast

A car pulled me over for driving too fast

But it's all good he just wants [?] to grab

The sun shining out a cloud in the sky

And every person I rode by waved to say hi

My phone started shaking a text came through

She was asking if it's cool if her friends came too



We all in the back of my pickup, blue [?] down

With a hose running water inside

She was sipping on apple pie moonshine, that's when I saw

That tan leg beauty walk by



That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise

That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise, yeah, yeah



She was hotter than a sauna, she turned her two piece

To a [?] then I wanted nothing on her

Now she dancing with the water, singing old school hip hop

Wanna be a baller

Barbecue, got the green [?] smoked out

The picnic table over look like a [?]

Folks piling in as the sun starts to fade

But they just get started, we've been at it all day

Living life in the moment, no regrets

Just one of them days that you won't forget

It ain't about the time zone or area codes

It's all the same damn thing everywhere that we go



We all in the back of my pickup, blue [?] down

With a hose running water inside

She was sipping on apple pie moonshine, that's when I saw

That tan leg beauty walk by



That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise

That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise, yeah, yeah



[?] backyard

[?] back watching stars

You can join us wherever you are

[?] backyard

[?] back watching stars

Don't bash what you hate

Promote what you love



We all in the back of my pickup, blue [?] down

With a hose running water inside

She was sipping on apple pie moonshine, that's when I saw

That tan leg beauty walk by



That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise

That's when I knew, that's when I knew

I was living in paradise, yeah, yeah
